text: My nisposlali poslannikov tol'ko dlya togo, chtoby im povinovalis' po vole Allakha. I yesli oni, postupiv nespravedlivo po otnosheniyu k samim sebe, prishli by k tebe i poprosili by proshcheniya u Allakha, yesli by i Poslannik tozhe poprosil za nikh, to oni ubedilis' by, chto Allakh - proshchayushchiy, miloserdnyy
